code: import React from"react";import locationIcon from"../icons/location.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Card(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card--container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.item.imageUrl,alt:"mallorca",className:"card--photo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card--info-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card--location-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"card--location-country",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:locationIcon,alt:"location icon",className:"card--location-icon"}),props.item.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:props.item.googleMapsUrl,className:"card--location-link",children:"View on Google Maps"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card--name",children:props.item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"card--data",children:[props.item.startDate,props.item.endDate&&" - ".concat(props.item.endDate)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card--description",children:props.item.description})]})]});}

sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import locationIcon from "../icons/location.png" export default function Card (props) { return(
{props.item.location} View on Google Maps

{props.item.title}

{props.item.startDate}{props.item.endDate && ` - ${props.item.endDate}`} {props.item.description}
) }
